com.embeddedunveiled.serial.internal

Class SerialComCRC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.internal.SerialComCRC

  • public final class SerialComCRC
extends java.lang.Object

    Helps in calculating CRC-CCITT value speedily using table based algorithm. It is used for checking data integrity of the data bytes communicated over serial port.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerialComCRC()
      Allocates a new SerialComCRC object.

    • Method Summary

      int getCRCval(byte[] data, int start, int end)
      Calculates CRC-CCITT value of the data bytes specified.

    • Method Detail

      • getCRCval

        public int getCRCval(byte[] data,
            int start,
            int end)

        Calculates CRC-CCITT value of the data bytes specified.

        The data bytes at start and end index are included in calculation.

        Parameters:
        data - byte type buffer for whom CRC is to be calculated
        start - offset in supplied data buffer from where CRC calculation should start
        end - offset in data buffer till which CRC should be calculated
        Returns:
        CRC value of specified data bytes
